{{cpp/container/queue/title|front}}
{{cpp/container/queue/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|
reference front();
}}
{{dcl|
const_reference front() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns reference to the first element in the queue. This element will be the first element to be removed on a call to {{lc|pop()}}. Effectively calls {{c|c.front()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Reference to the first element.

===Complexity===
Constant.
